metadata.title: Promall — The Future of E-Commerce Management
metadata.description: Run your online store like a pro. Powerful tools, beautiful interface, zero complexity.

hero.description: The all-in-one platform that transforms how you sell online. From inventory to AI-powered customer support — everything just works.
hero.subDescription: Join thousands of merchants who've already made the switch.

features.description: We've thought of every detail so you can focus on what matters most —

productManagement.title: Product Management
productManagement.description: Add products in seconds, not hours. Bulk editing, variant management, and smart categorization that actually makes sense.

orderControl.title: Order Dashboard
orderControl.description: Every order, every status, one beautiful view. Filter, search, and process orders faster than ever before.

inventoryManagement.title: Smart Inventory
inventoryManagement.description: Real-time stock tracking that prevents overselling. Low stock alerts, automatic reorder points, and warehouse sync.

securePayment.title: Seamless Payments
securePayment.description: Accept any payment method your customers prefer. Instant settlement, zero failed transactions, complete peace of mind.

autoPrinting.title: Auto-Print & Ship
autoPrinting.description: Labels, invoices, packing slips — generated and printed automatically. Connect your printer once, forget about it forever.

completeReports.title: Actionable Analytics
completeReports.description: Understand your business at a glance. Revenue trends, best sellers, customer insights — the data you need to grow.

howItWorks.description: Getting started takes minutes, not weeks. Here's how simple it is.

connect.title: Connect Your Store
connect.description: Import your existing products or start fresh. Our setup wizard handles everything — domains, payments, shipping. Just follow along.

customize.title: Make It Yours
customize.description: Configure your store exactly how you want it. Themes, checkout flow, notifications — every touchpoint reflects your brand.

grow.title: Start Selling
grow.description: Go live and watch orders roll in. Our AI handles customer inquiries while you focus on strategy. Scale without stress.

aiFeatures.description: Instagram DMs, customer questions, product recommendations — our AI handles it all. 24/7, in your brand's voice, with zero training required.

instantResponses.title: Instant Responses
instantResponses.description: Never miss a customer message. AI responds in seconds, any time of day.

smartEscalation.title: Smart Escalation
smartEscalation.description: Complex issues get routed to your team. Simple ones get solved automatically.

orderCreation.title: Order Creation
orderCreation.description: Customers can complete purchases right in the chat. No redirects, no friction.

brandVoice.title: Your Brand Voice
brandVoice.description: Customize responses to sound exactly like you. Professional, friendly, whatever fits.

largeTestimonial.quote: Promall didn't just improve our operations — it completely transformed how we think about running an online business. The time we've saved is incredible.
largeTestimonial.name: Sarah Chen
largeTestimonial.title: Founder, Luxe Cosmetics

pricing.description: Start free. Upgrade when you're ready. No hidden fees, no long-term contracts.

testimonials.title: Why teams love Promall
testimonials.description: Don't take our word for it. Here's what our customers say.

modernDesign.title: Beautiful by Default
modernDesign.description: An interface so intuitive, your team will actually enjoy using it. No training manual required.

speed.title: Blazing Fast
speed.description: Every action, instant. No loading spinners, no waiting. Just get things done.

security.title: Bank-Level Security
security.description: Your data is encrypted, backed up, and protected by the same standards used by financial institutions.

salesGrowth.title: Built for Growth
salesGrowth.description: From 10 orders to 10,000 — Promall scales with you. No migrations, no downtime, no limits.

support.title: Humans Who Care
support.description: Real people, real fast. Our support team responds in minutes, not days. We're in this together.

updates.title: Always Improving
updates.description: New features every week based on what you actually need. We listen, we build, you benefit.

sara.quote: We switched from three different tools to just Promall. Our team is happier, our customers are happier, and our revenue is up 40%.

cta.descriptionEnd: who run their stores on Promall. No credit card required.

footer.tagline: The future of e-commerce management. Simple, smart, powerful.

faq.description: Everything you need to know about Promall. Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is just a message away.

whatIsPromall.question: What exactly is Promall?
whatIsPromall.answer: Promall is a complete e-commerce management platform. Think of it as your store's command center — products, orders, inventory, payments, customer communication, analytics — all in one place. We built it because we were tired of juggling a dozen different tools, and we figured you might be too.

manageProducts.question: How hard is it to get started?
manageProducts.answer: Honestly? About as hard as setting up a new email account. Our setup wizard walks you through everything step by step. Most stores are up and running within an hour. If you're migrating from another platform, we can import your existing products automatically.

integrations.question: Can I connect my existing tools?
integrations.answer: Absolutely. We integrate with all major payment processors, shipping carriers, and accounting software. Instagram, Facebook, Zapier — you name it. And if something isn't available yet, our API lets you build custom connections.

freePlan.question: What's included in the free plan?
freePlan.answer: Everything you need to run a small store. Up to 25 products, 100 orders per month, basic analytics, and email support. It's not a trial — you can stay on free forever. When you need more power, you can upgrade anytime.

trackOrders.question: How does the AI customer support work?
trackOrders.answer: Our AI reads your incoming messages and responds intelligently based on your products, policies, and brand voice. It can answer questions, provide tracking info, even create orders. When something needs a human touch, it routes the conversation to your team. You stay in control.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Security isn't an afterthought for us. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We're SOC 2 Type II compliant, run on enterprise-grade infrastructure, and perform regular third-party security audits. Your customers' trust is our responsibility.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy.introduction: At Promall, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how PROMAL LABORATORIES ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and shares information when you use our online store management platform and related services.

informationCollected.title: Information We Collect
content: Account Information: When you create an account, we collect your name, email address, phone number, and password.
Business Information: Store name, business address, product listings, pricing information, and inventory data.
Transaction Data: Order history, payment information (processed securely through third-party payment providers), shipping addresses, and customer communications.
Usage Information: How you interact with our platform, including pages visited, features used, time spent on the platform, and device information.
Technical Data: IP address, browser type, operating system, device identifiers, and cookies for analytics and service improvement.
Third-Party Data: Information from integrated services such as Facebook, Instagram, or other platforms you connect to your Promall account.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
content: Provide Services: To operate and maintain your online store, process orders, manage inventory, and facilitate payments.
Improve Experience: To personalize your experience, provide customer support, and improve our platform features.
Communication: To send you important updates, service announcements, promotional offers (with your consent), and respond to your inquiries.
Analytics: To analyze usage patterns, monitor performance, and develop new features that better serve your needs.
Security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues, fraud, and unauthorized access.
Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal processes.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
content: Service Providers: We share data with trusted third-party providers who assist us in operating our platform, including payment processors, hosting services, and analytics providers.
Business Partners: With your consent, we may share data with integrated platforms (e.g., social media, shipping carriers) to enable features you request.
Legal Requirements: We may disclose information when required by law, court order, or to protect our rights and safety.
Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.
We do not sell your personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
content: Encryption: All data transmitted between your device and our servers is encrypted using industry-standard SSL/TLS protocols.
Secure Storage: Your data is stored on secure servers with restricted access and regular security audits.
Access Controls: We implement strict access controls to ensure only authorized personnel can access your information.
Regular Backups: We perform regular backups to prevent data loss and ensure business continuity.
Incident Response: We have procedures in place to detect, report, and respond to data security incidents promptly.

dataDeletion.title: Your Rights and Data Deletion
content: Access: You can request a copy of your personal data that we hold.
Correction: You can update or correct your account information at any time through your account settings.
Deletion: You can request deletion of your account and associated data by contacting us at privacy@promall.io or through your account settings.
Export: You can export your data in a machine-readable format before account deletion.
Opt-out: You can opt out of promotional communications at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails.
Upon receiving a deletion request, we will remove your personal data within 30 days, except where we are required to retain it for legal or legitimate business purposes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, or if you wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us:

privacy.footerNote: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
